select new com.jshx.whaqglzd.entity.CheSafMan(t.id, t.areaId, t.companyName, t.systemName, t.systemType) from CheSafMan t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.systemName like :systemName
and t.systemType = :systemType
and t.createUserID= :createUserId
and INSTR(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
order by t.createTime desc
